*Mantella stares as Stingtra finally catches the rat swallows it* Mantella:=
 Let's go to the beach. *Mantella, Drazom and Stingtra walk to the beach an=
d Mantella sits near the tide letting the water wash over her feet while St=
ingtra starts shaping sand and making Sand Bases while Drazom is collecting=
 sea shells and little sparking pebbles and then he walks up to a tree and =
pulls off a piece of vine and spots what the tide washed up. A little trian=
gle shaped piece of Energon. He walks up to it and picks it up. He then ope=
ns his storage compartment on the side of his arm and puts the sea shells, =
pebbles, vine and the piece of Energon in it and closes it* *They all sit t=
here thinking to themselves or at least Mantella and Stingtra do. Drazom ha=
s other plans. He sits over on a rock all by hisself and opens and takes th=
e items out of his arm storage compartment and lays them out on the rock lo=
oking at them*
